metadata.title: CVE-2017-15023 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: read_formatted_entries in dwarf2.c in the Binary File Descriptor (BFD)library (aka libbfd), as distributed in GNU Binutils 2.29, does notproperly validate the format count, which allows remote attackers to causea denial of service (NULL pointer dereference and application crash) via acrafted ELF file, related to concat_filename.

criterions.comment: binutils: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
